text: Oh! mwebwe muraba kunda mugihe nabo bataba kunda na gatoyi, namwe muremera ibitabu vyose, mugihe bahuye namwe baca bavuga bati:- twebwe turemeye mugabo mugihe biherereye bonyene baca baba hekenyera ibijigo n’ububabare bw’inshi cane, wewe n’uvuge uti:- ni mupfane n’ubwo bubabare bwanyu mu vy’ukuri Imana niyo ifise ubumenyi bw’ibiri mubikiriza vyanyu
